title: This game is hardly worth playing in this patch
body:
Say all you want about X not being as overpowered as it seems, or Y actually having counterplay, but there simply is no point if it's not fun. Losing isn't fun, _winning_ isn't even fun, nothing about this patch is enjoyable. It's despicable, it makes me sad.

If anyone sees me on anything but ARAM please do me a favor and yell at me to stop.. even then you might want to yell at me.
